title: Ancient China Quiz
description: From the Great Wall to the Silk Road, test your knowledge of one of the world's oldest and most influential civilizations.

questions.question: Which Chinese dynasty built the majority of the Great Wall as we know it today?
Who was the first emperor of a unified China?
What famous trade route connected China with the Mediterranean world?
What remarkable army of clay figures was discovered near the tomb of the first emperor?
Which ancient Chinese philosopher's teachings emphasized respect, morality, and proper social relationships?
Which of these was NOT one of China's Four Great Inventions?
Which Chinese dynasty is considered a golden age of poetry, art, and culture?
What philosophy, founded by Lao Tzu, emphasizes living in harmony with the Tao (the Way)?
What ancient Chinese military treatise, written by Sun Tzu, is still studied today?
Which dynasty established the civil service examination system to select government officials?
What precious material, whose production was a closely guarded Chinese secret, gave the Silk Road its name?
Which Mongol leader conquered China and founded the Yuan Dynasty?
What was the purpose of the Grand Canal, one of ancient China's greatest engineering projects?
options: Transport and trade between north and south China

questions.question: Which Chinese admiral led massive treasure voyages across the Indian Ocean in the early 1400s?
What writing material did the Chinese invent around 105 AD, eventually replacing bamboo strips and silk?
